# Node&lt;T&gt; class

Encapsulates a Linked List Node

```csharp
public class Node<T>
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [Next](Node-1/Next.md) { get; set; } | Next node in the list. Null of this is the tail of the list. |
| [Previous](Node-1/Previous.md) { get; set; } | Previous node in the list. Null if this is the head of the list. |
| [Value](Node-1/Value.md) { get; set; } | Object contained at this node in the list. |
